== About Me ==
Hi I'm Abdur Rahman, I'm a member of the Kernel Team at Canonical.

== What I do ==
I joined the Kernel Team at Canonical in February 2025. I work on cranks of different kernels including several server and cloud kernels. In particular I am involved with Nvidia partner kernels, participating in cranks, testing and patch review for those kernels.
